alert.note: Alert for Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 2:12AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Northern Lea County. In Texas, Gaines, Dawson, Borden and Scurry Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST /11 AM MST/ today. * IMPACTS...These wind chills will result in frost bite and lead to hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors, make sure you wear a hat and gloves.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
